summary: The diff implements Pinterest integration across backend and frontend, adding Pinterest as a social media link option in user profiles. All four requirements (REQ-21 through REQ-24) appear to be fully implemented with backend data model updates, frontend input fields in profile setup and editing, and display on profile pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module for backward compatibility with old user profiles
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'Existing profiles remain compatible with the schema change' as acceptance criteria, but does not request or specify the creation of a migration module. The added migration.mo file with OldUserProfile/NewUserProfile types and migration logic was not part of the requirements.
